if(ratings.length<1){ratings.push(0);}var sum=0;for(var i=0;i<ratings.length;i++){sum+=parseInt(ratings[i],10);}var avgCustomerRating=sum/ratings.length;avgCustomerRating%1!==0&&(avgCustomerRating=avgCustomerRating.toFixed(1));var avgCustStarRating=[];for(var _i=1;_i<6;_i++){if(avgCustomerRating>=_i){avgCustStarRating.push(React.createElement("p",{className:"p-1",key:'avg'+_i},fullStarSvg));}else{if(avgCustomerRating<=_i-.5&&avgCustomerRating>_i-1){avgCustStarRating.push(React.createElement("p",{className:"p-1",key:'avg'+_i},halfStartSvg));}else{avgCustStarRating.push(React.createElement("p",{className:"p-1",key:'avg'+_i},starSvg));}}}return{avgCustomerRating:avgCustomerRating,avgCustStarRating:avgCustStarRating};};
